statements: UPSERT INTO Pharmaceutical_Drugs (id, name, manufacturer, price, expiration_date) VALUES (1, 'Drug A', 'Manufacturer A', 25.50, '2023-06-30')
UPSERT INTO Pharmaceutical_Drugs (id, name, manufacturer, price, expiration_date) VALUES (2, 'Drug B', 'Manufacturer B', 35.75, '2022-12-15')
UPSERT INTO Pharmaceutical_Drugs (id, name, manufacturer, price, expiration_date) VALUES (3, 'Drug C', 'Manufacturer C', 18.99, '2024-08-10')

UPSERT INTO Drugs (drug_id, name, manufacturer, dosage) VALUES (1, 'Paracetamol', 'ABC Pharma', 500) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), manufacturer = VALUES(manufacturer), dosage = VALUES(dosage)

UPSERT INTO Patients (patient_id, name, age, gender, address) VALUES (101, 'John Doe', 30, 'Male', '123 Main St') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), age = VALUES(age), gender = VALUES(gender), address = VALUES(address)

UPSERT INTO Drugs (drug_id, name, manufacturer, dosage) VALUES (2, 'Advil', 'XYZ Pharma', 200) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), manufacturer = VALUES(manufacturer), dosage = VALUES(dosage)
INSERT INTO Drugs (id, name, price) VALUES (1, 'Paracetamol', 5.99) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='Paracetamol', price=5.99
INSERT INTO Manufacturers (id, name, location) VALUES (1, 'ABC Pharmaceuticals', 'New York') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='ABC Pharmaceuticals', location='New York'
INSERT INTO Sales (id, drug_id, manufacturer_id, quantity, sale_date) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 100, '2022-01-15') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE drug_id=1, manufacturer_id=1, quantity=100, sale_date='2022-01-15'
UPSERT INTO pharmacy (id, name, location) VALUES (1, 'Pharmacy A', 'Location A')
UPSERT INTO pharmacy (id, name, location) VALUES (2, 'Pharmacy B', 'Location B')
UPSERT INTO pharmacy (id, name, location) VALUES (3, 'Pharmacy C', 'Location C')

UPSERT INTO manufacturers (manufacturer_id, name, location) VALUES ('1e7c5614-b1bc-4ab6-bc18-21b3d0e4e403', 'Pfizer', 'New York') ON CONFLICT (manufacturer_id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Pfizer', location = 'New York';

UPSERT INTO patients (patient_id, name, age, address) VALUES ('4f839ca1-1cdf-4866-ae41-9b7e5b8c146e', 'John Doe', 40, '123 Main St') ON CONFLICT (patient_id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'John Doe', age = 40, address = '123 Main St';

UPSERT INTO pharmacies (pharmacy_id, name, location, phone_number) VALUES ('45f6d750-12d6-4b3a-894c-7ad5bf5e54af', 'Walgreens', 'Chicago', '123-456-7890') ON CONFLICT (pharmacy_id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Walgreens', location = 'Chicago', phone_number = '123-456-7890';
